alert.note: Alert for Lemhi and Lost River Range, Challis NF (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 28 at 9:11PM MDT until July 29 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 476 BELOW 6500 FEET ELEVATION... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 476 Lemhi and Lost River Range/Challis NF below 6500 feet. * TIMING...From noon to 8 PM MDT Saturday. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 13 percent. * IMPACTS...Hot, dry, and breezy conditions will support rapid wildfire spread and potentially long range spotting of embers.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly based on these criteria for Southeastern Idaho: - Relative humidity at or below 15 percent and wind gusts of at least 25 mph in the mountains, or 30 mph in the Snake Plain. - Thunderstorm coverage of 25 percent, without specific rainfall criteria. - Other high impact events deemed critical by the National Weather Service and area fire management agencies.

area.areaDesc: Lemhi and Lost River Range, Challis NF
